attributes.action: Allow Rochelle Wallis to remain in the UK with her husband.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rochelle Wallis (Canadian) should be allowed to remain in the UK with her UK citizen husband (as they would be entitled to do in any other EU country) while the government realise that you cannot discriminate against UK citizens in their own country relative to other EU countries because this infringes their human rights in EU law. QED.

rejection.details: IIndividual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
